overview:
Robyn Hansen is the VP of business development for Orange Collar media. As one of the few female executives in the world of technology, Robyn continues to impress her partners by thinking out of the box. Robyn’s main focus is business development, harnessing new initiatives and hiring the best designers and project managers. Robyn runs a team of 7 developers. Her goal is to get the right person in the right spot to make Orange Collar Media run smoothly. Orange Collar Media sticks to its promises. Treating our employees well and our clients with respect is our top priority.

Robyn sees the value of creating jobs in the tech world. Its going to be a fast growing industry. She is always looking for talented individuals. Email her at robyn@orangecollarmedia.com
